channel.title: Internet Browser problem/Java problem
channel.description:
Hey everyone, every time I try to play runescape (on Firefox or IE), the window will just...close. It's everytime I choose a world and it gets to the client, and it doesn't give it enough time to load anything. Any suggestions on how to fix it?...
EDIT: Now I uninstalled Java and tried to reinstall but during the installation I got: "Error 1606.Could not access network location http://www.javadl.sun.com/webapps/download/getfile/1.6.0_02-b06/windows-i586/jb160000.cab." EDIT2: Downloaded using IE. Install Successful. Runescape plays now, but only on IE...

item.title: Internet Browser problem/Java problem
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Yep. Now it works. Thank you.

Mods, feel free to delete this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Internet Browser problem/Java problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Uninstall FireFox, and re install.
Make sure it has the plugin for Java.

Read full topic
